trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>, source column name, and <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"> </xref> para especificado <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"> </xref>, nome da coluna de origem, e <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> exists in the collection, it is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>existe na coleção, é devolvido.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> does not exist in the collection, for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following actions occur: |MissingMappingAction|Action Taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column name.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>não existe na coleção, para um determinado <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, as ações seguintes ocorrem: | MissingMappingAction | Ação tomada | |--------------------------|------------------| | `Passthrough`| Cria um <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>com o nome de coluna de origem especificada como tanto o nome de coluna de origem e o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>nome da coluna.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> </xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|Gets a null value.|
trans-unit.target: Este <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>não está adicionada à coleção. | | `Error`| Um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é gerado se o mapeamento de colunas especificado está em falta. | | `Ignore`| Obtém um valor nulo. |</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe).

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection>
